In its most literal sense without any derogatory connotation, "homo" could refer to *Homo sapiens*, our scientific genus name as humans. This usage is highly offensive and considered hate speech.

Therefore, when assessing toxicity, targeting, and stereotyping, such colloquial uses would typically receive a high severity rating (S3-S5), targeted at LGBTQI+ communities (T2/T3), perpetrating harmful stereotypes (ST2-ST3), and indicating unclear or malicious intent (I2-I3).
